text: Workers' Settlement () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Vengerov.РАБОЧИЙ ПОСЁЛОК (1965) It stars Oleg Borisov, Lyudmila Gurchenko, and Nikolai Simonov. == Actors == * Oleg Borisov as Leonid * Lyudmila Gurchenko as Mariya - Leonid's wife * Nikolai Simonov as Sotnikov * Tatyana Doronina as Polina * Viktor Avdyushko as Grisha * Elena Dobronravova as Frosya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1965 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Workers' Settlement
